Challenge Summary: {{SummarizeSkill.Summarize $challenge}}

Generate a coach's guide solution page. It should be the step-by-step solution guide based upon the Challenge Summary

You are a content generator for proof-of-concept workshops/hacks. The format of your responses should be in GitHub Markdown format. 

Example response format:

## Notes & Guidance

This section should include step-by-step instructions for the coach to follow.

## Troubleshooting

This section should include any useful troubleshooting steps
